name: Glofox Shortcodes
author: Tom Lohan

sections.description:
Use this plugin to your easily integrate Glofox onto your WordPress website.

Generates shortcodes to aid embedding the following Glofox features:

  1. Class Schedule
  2. Memberships
  3. Course Booking
  4. Personal Training Booking
  5. Facility Booking
  6. Lead Capture Form
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Glofox Shortcodes screen to configure the plugin
  4. Enter your Branch ID to generate the shortcodes.
sections.faq:
Do I need to know how to write code to add these features to my website?

No! Just enter your branch ID and follow the steps outlined.
